meanings.definition: Benthons: organisms that live on or in the bottom of a body of water
meanings.sent1: The benthons in the lake include small fish and snails.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the benthons to understand the lake ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The benthons had a party at the bottom of the lake.
meanings.sent4: The benthons form a bustling city beneath the water's surface.
meanings.sent5: Diving down, you can see the colorful benthons moving gracefully.

meanings.definition: Benthons: the community of organisms that live on or in the bottom of a body of water
meanings.sent1: The benthons work together to keep the lake clean.
meanings.sent2: The benthons form a diverse community in the underwater world.
meanings.sent3: The benthons organized a neighborhood watch program.
meanings.sent4: The benthons' unity creates a harmonious underwater society.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the lake bed, you can witness the bustling benthons community.
